attributes.action: Stop the Israeli government annexation plan of the West Bank.
attributes.additional_details: The annexation plan of the Israeli government is a big dent to peace in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. According to the plan almost 30% of the West Bank will be annexed by Israel.
attributes.background: The UK government should oppose the Israeli government’s annexation plan of the West Bank. It is widely prohibited by international law to annex territory acquired by force. The West Bank was taken by force in the 1967 war and has been recognised as an occupied territory.
